questions.question: What is one of the primary business goals of introducing automation?
options: To automatically account for changes in data's schema, saving time on quality assurance
To increase revenue by driving sales
To reduce human intervention in processes, saving time and money

questions.question: Automations can both send and receive alerts to and from other applications.
Which of the following is an example of a case where you would NOT want to use an Automation in FME Server?
options: Automatically processing data that has been sent in through email
Handling data streamed from a temperature sensor more than once per second
Alerting an administrator when a database update fails
Monitoring a directory for newly uploaded files

questions.question: Which FME Server feature should you use if you need to handle messages arriving more than once every second?
